segments.text: Would you like to copy the EX files and pass me the copy . There are some figures I want to check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the copy . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I also need all the letters we received from them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean all the sales letters from them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll get them for you at once . And could I file the report for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I need the report copied on transparency paper .
segments.speaker: S1
